results.title: Losartan but not atenolol reduce carotid artery hypertrophy in essential hypertension. A LIFE substudy.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@Losartan@@@ but not @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ reduce @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@carotid artery hypertrophy@@@ in essential @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Absolute and relative changes in carotid intima-media thickness and atherosclerotic plaques during long-term antihypertensive treatment: further results of the European Lacidipine Study on Atherosclerosis (ELSA).
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: In ELSA, a randomized, double-blind trial in 2334 @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensives@@@, 4-year antihypertensive treatment with @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@lacidipine@@@ slowed down progression of @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@carotid atherosclerosis@@@ significantly more than @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Zanchetti A, Bond MG, Hennig M, Tang R, Hollweck R, Mancia G, Eckes L, Micheli D, ELSA Investigators. Absolute and relative changes in carotid intima-media thickness and atherosclerotic plaques during long-term antihypertensive treatment: further results of the European Lacidipine Study on Atherosclerosis (ELSA). J Hypertens. 2004 Jun;22(6):1201-12. PMID: 15167456

results.title: Evaluating the benefits of an antihypertensive agent using trials based on event and organ damage: the Systolic Hypertension in the Elderly Long-term Lacidipine (SHELL) trial and the European Lacidipine Study on Atherosclerosis (ELSA).
results.text_hl: EUROPEAN @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@LACIDIPINE@@@ STUDY ON @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@ATHEROSCLEROSIS@@@ (ELSA) TRIAL: In the ELSA trial, the effects of @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@lacidipine@@@-based treatment and beta-blocker (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@)-based treatment on the development and progression of @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@carotid atherosclerosis@@@ are to be assessed in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Zanchetti A. Evaluating the benefits of an antihypertensive agent using trials based on event and organ damage: the Systolic Hypertension in the Elderly Long-term Lacidipine (SHELL) trial and the European Lacidipine Study on Atherosclerosis (ELSA). results.title: Serum uric acid and resistance to antihypertensive treatment: data from the European Lacidipine Study on Atherosclerosis.
results.text_hl: METHODS: The European @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@Lacidipine@@@ Study on @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@Atherosclerosis@@@ (ELSA) was a randomized, double-blind, multicenter trial comparing the effects of a 4-year treatment with either @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@lacidipine@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on progression of @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@carotid atherosclerosis@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with moderate @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Baseline reproducibility of B-mode ultrasonic measurement of carotid artery intima-media thickness: the European Lacidipine Study on Atherosclerosis (ELSA).
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND AND OBJECTIVE: The European @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@Lacidipine@@@ Study of @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@Atherosclerosis@@@ (ELSA) is a prospective, randomized, double-blind, multi-national interventional trial to determine the effect of four-year treatment using the @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@lacidipine@@@ versus the beta-blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@carotid atherosclerosis@@@ in 2259 asymptomatic @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Tang R, Hennig M, Thomasson B, Scherz R, Ravinetto R, Catalini R, Rubba P, Zanchetti A, Bond MG. Baseline reproducibility of B-mode ultrasonic measurement of carotid artery intima-media thickness: the European Lacidipine Study on Atherosclerosis (ELSA). J Hypertens. 2000 Feb;18(2):197-201. PMID: 10694188
